name: substantially
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: substantially
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: The new rules will substantially change how we do things.
example.egtrans: 新规则会在很大程度上改变我们的行事方式。

dsense.name: substantially
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: This model has leather seats, but the two cars are substantially the same.
example.egtrans: 这一型号有几个附加装置，但两款车大体上是一样的。
